alert.note: Alert for Eastern Walsh County; Grand Forks; Pembina (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 6:55PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northwestern Marshall, southwestern Kittson, north central Grand Forks, eastern Walsh and southeastern Pembina Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 655 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Drayton to near Oakwood to near Veseleyville. Movement was southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Grafton, Drayton, Stephen, Minto, Oslo, Gilby and Forest River. This includes Interstate 29 between mile markers 160 and 189. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Walsh County; Grand Forks; Pembina
